conversion_verification.notes: True 3D isometric cutaway successful. Wall thickness and furniture volumes are correctly rendered.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent transformation. Interior volume and elevated isometric projection are well-executed.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room layout is highly faithful to the plan. Internal partitions and bed positions align perfectly.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement matches the 2D layout logically, including kitchen counters and the dining set.

visual_clarity.notes: High clarity; consistent materials. Minor artifacting on one exterior balcony rail.

detected_errors.description: Some door swing details are simplified as openings rather than distinct panels.
Slight geometric abstraction on the external balcony railings compared to the source lines.

summary: A highly accurate and geometrically faithful 3D conversion that maintains all room adjacencies and furniture placements from the original plan.
